text: "Paradise is a recipe for love and for disaster at the same time."
title: Everyone Is Miserable on Bachelor in Paradise--and Scallop Fingers Are to Blame?!

meta_data.description: "Paradise is a recipe for love and for disaster at the same time." Monday night's episode of Bachelor in Paradise definitely was more disaster than love. A lot more.... ...
